name: youtube-embed2link
description: This addon converts embeded videos into links to the video on YouTube.  Great for mobile deivces so you can watch the video in the YouTube app.
author: Kevin Cox <kevincox@kevincox.ca>

preferences.title: The Quality of thumbnail to use.
preferences.name: thumbnailQuality

preferences.title: The URL to link to.  '%vid%' will be replaced with the video ID.
preferences.name: url
